creator: ramanathan@elmeasure.com
text:

in JMETER CMD console window.

While Adding Components under Threadgroup using mouse scroll it will simply hangs and in jmeter CMD windows displaying exception like :
Uncaught Exception java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1. See log file for details.

text:

What OS are you using?
